mappy.plotting.subplots module¶

subplots(n=1, **kwargs)[source]¶

Creating a flat array of subplots of length ‘n’.

Parameters

n (int or tuple) – Count of subplots. Should be bigger than 1. If an iterable is given it gives the horizontal and vertical count of the plots.

Other Parameters

**kwargs (keyword arguments passed to subplots())

Returns

  • f (Figure)

  • ax (list of Axes) – flat list of axes that can be looped over
